sentences.en: A degree of collective immunity may be observed.
sentences.cn: 可见到一定程度的群体免疫力.

sentences.en: An unmodified attack of measles usually confers lifelong immunity.
sentences.cn: 自然经过的麻疹,一般产生终身免疫.

sentences.en: Because of the immunity of the immature insects, it'simportant to spray regularly.
sentences.cn: 由于幼虫对药物有免疫力，因此必须经常喷药。

sentences.en: But a new study shows that people with true expertise in a subject have some immunity to the siren song of corporate sponsorship.
sentences.cn: 一项新的研究发现，在某一方面有真才实学的人们对广告赞助商的“糖衣炮弹”有一定的免疫力。

sentences.en: High levels of stress may lower your immunity to common illnesses.
sentences.cn: 压力过大可能会使你对常见疾病的免疫力下降.

sentences.en: Immunity for our island has gone too since we took to commerce.
sentences.cn: 自从我们开始对外贸易以来,我们岛国不受外界影响的免疫力已经不存在了.

sentences.en: Noise immunity is the maximum amplitude of noise.
sentences.cn: 抗扰度是最大的噪声幅值.

sentences.en: Once you have had a cold you build up immunity to that particular virus.
sentences.cn: 你一旦患上感冒,你的身体就会产生对付那种病毒的免疫力.

sentences.en: The current outbreak seems to be entering this stage, though not necessarily because we have all developed immunity.
sentences.cn: 现在的流感爆发像是进入了这一阶段，不过并不一定是因为我们都有这种免疫力。

sentences.en: The extremists would probably storm the place - they wouldn't respect diplomatic immunity.
sentences.cn: 极端分子说不定会冲击大使馆 -- 他们不会尊重外交豁免权.

sentences.en: The immunity achieved is generally brief and must be boosted.
sentences.cn: 所获得的免疫性一般是短暂的,须激发注射.

sentences.en: The newcomers lacked immunity against local strains of the disease.
sentences.cn: 新来的人对这一疾病在当地的几种类型缺乏免疫力.

sentences.en: The police are offering immunity to witnesses.
sentences.cn: 警方对证人将免予起诉。

sentences.en: They respected diplomatic immunity as valid.
sentences.cn: 他们承认外交豁免权有效.

sentences.en: To protect you against small pox or diphtheria, you are vaccinated with a small amount of the toxin, and then your body develops immunity against that toxin.
sentences.cn: 为了避免你长小脓包或得白喉病，所以会给你的身体接种小量毒素，然后你的身体会针对这些毒素产生免疫力。

sentences.en: Unions were granted immunity from prosecution for non - violent acts.
sentences.cn: 工会获得赋予非暴力行动的豁免起诉权.
疫苗也引起细胞介导免疫.

sentences.en: Very few people will have any immunity to this particular combination, which is what gives the concern that this will be a pandemic rather than just a normal seasonal flu outbreak.
sentences.cn: 因为很少有人具备对这种特别的混合病毒的免疫力。 人们因此担心，这将不仅仅是正常的季节性流感疫情，而是一次传染病的大流行。

sentences.en: You Honour, I ask no mercy and I plead for no immunity.
sentences.cn: 阁下, 我不求宽大,也不求豁免.

words.tran_cn: 使免疫（immunize的过去式、过去分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 适应性免疫；获得性免疫；继承性免疫
细胞免疫；细胞介导免疫
天然免疫，自然免疫力；先天免疫性

trans.tran_en: the state of being immune to a disease
